argument.name: indexOrValue
argument.description: The position in the List where the data should be inserted. You can either specify a zero-based numeric index to indicate what row to insert the data after, or you can specify a 'value' (e.g. 'Smith') where 'value' is the value returned by the List. When you specify a value, the data will be inserted after the row in which the value appears.

argument.name: data
argument.description: An array of JSON objects with data to insert into the List.

page.description: Inserts data into a List control at a position specified by *[js:indexOrValue]*.
